actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To expand the boundary of Booker T. Washington National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act

summary.text: Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act - Amends federal law relating to the establishment of the Booker T. Washington National Monument in Virginia to expand the boundary of the Monument to include specified lands.

titles.title: Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act
To expand the boundary of Booker T. Washington National Monument, and for other purposes.
